branchCategory.name: VER
branchCategory.description: <p>The 5 port electro-pneumatic proportional valve, Series VER can be used to switch and actuate a cylinder and to perform stepless pressure control of port A through electric signals.  The VER2000 (direct operated type) is available with 1/4 or 3/8 port size.  The VER4000 (internal pilot type) and the VER4001 (external pilot type) are available with 3/8, 1/2 or 3/4 port size.  Thread types include Rc, G, NPT or NPTF.  The VER is also available without a sub-plate.</p>

branchItem.name: VER2000/4000, 5 Port Electro-Pneumatic Proportional Valve
branchItem.description: <p>The 5 port electro-pneumatic proportional valve, Series VER can be used to switch and actuate a cylinder and to perform stepless pressure control of port A through electric signals.  The VER2000 (direct operated type) is available with 1/4 or 3/8 port size.  The VER4000 (internal pilot type) and the VER4001 (external pilot type) are available with 3/8, 1/2 or 3/4 port size.  Thread types include Rc, G, NPT or NPTF.  The VER is also available without a sub-plate.</p>
